scripts.bootstrap:ts: echo 'not working due to react typescript and ts-node imcompatible tsconfig.json' && ts-node src/lib/bootstrap.tsx
scripts.bootstrap:shell: npm run bootstrap:shell:account && npm run bootstrap:shell:airdrop
scripts.clean:program-rust:resource: cargo clean --manifest-path=./src/program-rust-resource/Cargo.toml && rm -rf ./dist && npm run clean:store
scripts.watch:program-rust:resource: cd src/program-rust-resource && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo watch --clear --exec test
scripts.deploy:program-rust:resource: solana --url localhost --config ./src/lib/keygen.out.json program deploy dist/program/solana_bpf_resource.so > src/lib/resource_deploy.out.json
scripts.clean:program-rust:searchengine: cargo clean --manifest-path=./src/program-rust-searchengine/Cargo.toml && rm -rf ./dist && npm run clean:store
scripts.watch:program-rust:searchengine: cd src/program-rust-searchengine && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo watch --clear --exec test
scripts.deploy:program-rust:searchengine: solana --url localhost --config ./src/lib/keygen.out.json program deploy dist/program/solana_bpf_searchengine.so > src/lib/searchengine_deploy.out.json && cat src/lib/searchengine_deploy.out.json | jq '.programId' > src/lib/searchengine_deploy_raw.out.json
scripts.clean:program-rust:bootstrap: cargo clean --manifest-path=./src/program-rust-bootstrap/Cargo.toml && rm -rf ./dist && npm run clean:bootstrap
scripts.watch:program-rust:bootstrap: cd src/program-rust-bootstrap && RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo watch --clear --exec test
